## 0.5.2 (2026-01-06)

### Fixes

- If any parent folder of output folder does not exist, this is created

## 0.5.1 (2025-12-27)

### Fixes

- Removed parentheses from calling signature

## 0.5.0 (2025-12-16)

### Breaking change

- The default of localecmd_target_codeblocks setting is now true

### New features

- Prepended and substituted (meaning "hidden") parameters of commands are no longer shown in autodoc of command
- Added config to ignore lcmd-examples in certain files with regular expression
- Added overview of all lcmd-example directives

## 0.4.3 (2025-12-15)

### Fixes

- Fixed problem with quotes in lcmd-example directives

## 0.4.2 (2025-12-15)

### Fixes

- Fixed problem with smart quotes in lcmd-example directives

## 0.4.1 (2025-12-14)

### Fixes

- Fixed output of parameter description
- Apply correct fence size to directives
- Use correct sice of backtick fence for directives
- Remove another invalid option of topic
- Remove invalid option of topic
- Remove reference config value that is not actually there

## 0.4.0 (2025-12-11)

### New features

- Fixed translation of output

## 0.3.0 (2025-12-07)

### Breaking change

- Configs with searchpath for localecmd.modules must be rewritten

### Changes

- Specify localecmd.module directly and add names explicitly

## 0.2.0 (2025-12-06)

### New features

- Added cli output directive
- Added option to remove python code blocks from autodoc output
- Added config of output directory

### Changes

- Index page is now internally generated by jinja2 template
- Don't remove subdirectories of output directory. \n\ngave problems while testing.

## 0.1.0 (2025-12-02)
